Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of the Athletic Fund College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-05-2015 Brief Job Description: Advance the mission of Athletics by planning and implementing a comprehensive solicitation strategy that will grow the current donor base and raise financial support for 18 varsity programs.
